org.csapi.csapicore.utils
Class XMLProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.csapi.csapicore.utils.XMLProvider

public class XMLProvider
extends java.lang.Object

XML provider utility for SessionMgr.

SessionMgr provides a set of static methods to get XML-enrobed Strings for communications with the server. Basically, a request is modeled after this structure:

  1. SOAP Head: some invariant XML for SOAP headers.
  2. CSAPI Token: the identifier of the current session, relative to last login on the server.
  3. CSAPI Role: role to be used for this session.
  4. CSAPI Database: path of the database to be used on the server.
  5. CSAPI User: the login to be used for this session.
  6. Action Flag: a keyword to state reason of request (either login, report, transition, etc.).
  7. Some options for the selected action flag.
  8. SOAP Tail: some invariant XML for SOAP tail.

Author:
Boris Baldassari

getXMLActionFlagDataReport

public static java.lang.String getXMLActionFlagDataReport()
Static method to get XML-enrobed 'data_report' value of the action_flag tag. Value passed as parameter is assumed to be already URL-encoded

Returns:
the action_flag xml string for data_report.

Static method to get XML-enrobed value for a provided csapi_token value.

Parameters:
csapiToken - The csapi_token to be used when sending the request (ensures that user has successfuly logged in.
Returns:
Returns the csapiToken enrobed with XML.

reportName - The name of the report to be used.
Returns:
Returns the report name enrobed with XML.
